title: ROUNDED PIXEL/FUTURISTIC FONTS
content:
Hello ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
I saw a show last night called 'OPERATION SANDMAN' on UPN.   
   
A font was used for a logo CE 3 in the show.   
   
The font looked like a bitmap font but edges were slightly rounded (rounded squares).   
   
I have a font called MOONBASEALPHA which is similar but not the same.   
   
Does anybody know where I could find a font or fonts like this (kind of like the 'truth' anti-smoking logo - but solid)   
   
commercial of freeware?   
   
Thx!   
   
 ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Glen T.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Thanks Stephen ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
The show used a font close to or a variation of ELEMENT 15.   
   
 ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Glen - Here are a few rounded-square grid fonts...   
   
- [Mastertext](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=DET0000137) by Rian Hughes   
- [EF SCREAM.hot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily19425.html) by Ulf C. Stein   
- [SB Byte](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily7185.html) by Craig Stainton   
- [Punch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.thirstype.com/font_punch.html) by Rick Valicenti and Gregg Brokaw   
- [SB Modem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily9605.html) by Craig Stainton   
- [GAU Private](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.interq.or.jp/ox/gau/gau_pra/font/index2.html) by Toshiyuki Takahashi   
- [Aspersion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/www.synfonts.com/aspersion/index.html) by Don Synstelien   
- [DPI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/66.70.183.115/fonts/fontshow/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&ID=1013&ww=on&view_records=View%2BRecords) by Jakob Straub   
- [Element 15 Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/66.70.183.115/fonts/fontshow/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&ID=969&ww=on&view_records=View%2BRecords) by Ben Husmann   
- [Union Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160714/http:/66.70.183.115/fonts/fontshow/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&ID=32945&ww=on&view_records=View%2BRecords) by Lewis Tsalis   
   
Stephen
